sections.title: Pain Taster (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Pain Taster class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Pain Taster)
sections.description: Grants proficiency with all simple weapons, martial weapons, and whips, but provides no armor or shield proficiencies.

sections.title: Disciple of Pain (Su) (Pain Taster)
sections.description: Allows selection of one of six torture routines that grant +2 enhancement bonuses to different ability scores for 24 hours, requiring initial 2000 gp investment and 1-hour ritual.

sections.title: Masochism (Ex) (Pain Taster)
sections.description: Provides +4 bonus on saves against pain effects and allows swift action self-harm for attack and damage bonuses that scale with level.

sections.title: Scourge (Ex) (Pain Taster)
sections.description: Grants Weapon Focus (whip) as a bonus feat, or Whip Mastery if already possessing Weapon Focus (whip).

sections.title: Cruelty (Ex) (Pain Taster)
sections.description: Grants sneak attack damage that only applies when using a whip, increasing by 1d6 every 2 levels and stacking with other sneak attack sources.

sections.title: Damage Reduction (Ex) (Pain Taster)
sections.description: Provides damage reduction that increases by 1 every 2 levels and doubles effectiveness against nonlethal damage, stacking with other DR sources.

sections.title: Blood Control (Ex) (Pain Taster)
sections.description: Reduces bleed and Constitution damage from blood loss, and allows delaying poison effects as an immediate action with a Will save.

sections.title: Torturer’s Mettle (Ex) (Pain Taster)
sections.description: Grants temporary hit points equal to class level as a swift action lasting 1 minute, usable once per day plus additional uses every 3 levels.

sections.title: Pain Mastery (Ex) (Pain Taster)
sections.description: Allows combining two torture routines simultaneously for dual enhancement bonuses, requiring damage from both routines but only 1 hour total time.

sections.title: Exquisite Lash (Ex) (Pain Taster)
sections.description: Grants Whip Mastery as a bonus feat, or Improved Whip Mastery if already possessing Whip Mastery.

sections.title: Sadism (Ex) (Pain Taster)
sections.description: Reduces masochism self-damage cost by half until end of next turn when dealing cruelty sneak attack damage to targets.
